desc: Cotton Flavors works closely with our trusted suppliers & partners within the U.S. Our mission is to provide our shoppers with premium & stylish facial protection and to help out the local communities in need.

layout.text:
Our tailored masks are crafted from premium and eco-conscious materials. They are designed to keep you safe from common elements at home and when going out in public, while providing you with a pure feeling of comfort. Did we mention that they look amazing too? All crafted and shipped within 7 business days across the U.S.
Profits from each purchase go to local communities, hospitals, and non-profits in need!
